sentences.en: After days of reflection she decided to write back.
sentences.cn: 想了几天之后她决定回信。

sentences.en: All abbreviations are to be written out.
sentences.cn: 所有的缩写都要完整地写出来

sentences.en: an open-ended and generous scholarship that lets recipients write their own ticket.
sentences.cn: 让受领者自行决定的无限额且大笔的奖学金

sentences.en: Are we going to write a story or summat?
sentences.cn: 咱们是要写个故事，还是怎么的？

sentences.en: felt he had to write down to his students.
sentences.cn: 感觉到他必须写得浅显学生才能看懂

sentences.en: Finding a volunteer to write the computer program isn't a problem.
sentences.cn: 找个志愿者编这个计算机程序不成问题。

sentences.en: guilt was written all over his face.
sentences.cn: 愧疚全写在他的脸上。

sentences.en: guilt was written all over his face.
sentences.cn: 愧疚全写在他的脸上。

sentences.en: he urged the banks to write off debt owed by poorer countries.
sentences.cn: 他催促银行勾销穷国所欠的债务。

sentences.en: His abhorrence of racism led him to write The Algiers Motel Incident.
sentences.cn: 对种族主义的憎恨促使他写了《阿尔及尔汽车旅馆事件》一书。

sentences.en: I consider it my duty to write to you and thank you.
sentences.cn: 我认为写信向你表达谢意是我的责任。

sentences.en: I could write for TV as well as any of those goofs.
sentences.cn: 我写的电视剧肯定一点儿不比那帮笨蛋写得差。

sentences.en: I have been moved to write a few lines of verse.
sentences.cn: 我因感动而写下了几句诗。

sentences.en: I was too tired to write up my notes.
sentences.cn: 我太累了，无法详细地记笔记。

sentences.en: I wrote her several letters , but she didn’t reply.
sentences.cn: 我给她写了几封信，可是她没有回复。

sentences.en: On the morning before starting the fast, write down your starting weight.
sentences.cn: 早晨开始禁食前，记下你的体重。

sentences.en: One in four pupils leaving secondary school can't read or write properly.
sentences.cn: 中学毕业生中有1/4的人读写有问题。

sentences.en: The car was a write-off, but everyone escaped unharmed.
sentences.cn: 这辆车报废了，但人员全部安全逃离。

sentences.en: The guide book contains a short write-up of each hotel.
sentences.cn: 指南上有对每个饭店的简评。

sentences.en: They can neither read nor write, nor can they comprehend such concepts.
sentences.cn: 他们不会读，不会写，也理解不了这样的概念。

sentences.en: they were written off as a bunch of no-hopers.
sentences.cn: 他们作为一群没有希望的人而不被重视。

sentences.en: Today was really a bit of a write-off for me.
sentences.cn: 今天对我来说真的有点儿白白浪费了。

sentences.en: we were arguing about who should pay the bill, but he pulled out a couple of hundreds and that's all she wrote.
sentences.cn: 我们正在争论谁该付账，但他掏出了两三张百元大钞，她也就没什么可说的了。

sentences.en: Write "By Airmail" in the top left hand corner.
sentences.cn: 在左上角写上“航空邮递”.

sentences.en: write in with a completed entry form.
sentences.cn: 写信并附上填好的申请表

sentences.en: write out a request.
sentences.cn: 写出一项要求

sentences.en: Write your letter and seal it in a blank envelope.
sentences.cn: 信写好后把它装进空白信封里封好。

sentences.en: wrote him up for speeding.
sentences.cn: 写传票告他超速

sentences.en: wrote in an apology at the end of the note.
sentences.cn: 在纸条末尾加上一句道歉的话

sentences.en: wrote off the rainy first day of the vacation.
sentences.cn: 假期第一天就下雨真扫兴

words.tran_cn: 书写；作品；著作；[法] 笔迹

phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)全都写上了；没有其他要说的

phrases.phrase: be (或 have something) written all over one (或 one'
be nothing to write home about
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)不值得大书特书的；不十分好的，平庸的
自订计划，自行决定：按照某人自己的需求或愿望决定做事、行动的步骤和计划
浅显地写：以浅显或谦逊的风格写
以书信联络：与某个组织以邮件通讯的方式交往
完全写出：写出全称或完整的形式
(主美)在（选票上）加写（非原定候选人）的名字；投（非原定候选人）的票
勾销（不良债务等）；承认损失（资产）
（写传票）告发：写传票告发（某人）违反法规

trans.tran_cn: 写（字/书/信），创作(歌曲)，开具（支票等），（往计算机等）写入
trans.tran_en: to put words in a letter to someone
